```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

```

```{r}

# Create sequence of impervious fractions
IA <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
A <- 182
V <- predict_runoff(IA, A)

# Create data frame to bind the sequence of IA together with V
runoff_data <- data.frame(ImperviousFraction = IA, RunoffVolume = V)

# plot it!
ggplot(data = runoff_data, aes(x = IA, y = V)) +
  geom_point(color = "#1E90FF") +
  geom_line(color = "#FE5A1C") +
  labs(title = "The volume of stormwater expected for a watershed",
      x = "Impervious Fraction",
      y = "Runoff Volume")

ggsave(width = 8, height = 6, here::here("figs", "runoff_volumes.png"))
```
